thread.title: 21 Times Raising A Teenage Boy Will Make You Say, "Fuck"
thread.title_full: 21 Times Raising A Teenage Boy Will Make You Say, "Fuck"

author: Mike Spohr
title: 21 Times Raising A Teenage Boy Will Make You Say, "Fuck"
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫
reddit.com ID: 10500388 2. If you ask him to rake the leaves, you will regret it. View this image ‚Ä∫
imgur.com ID: 10500320 3. He will use every glass in the house and leave the kitchen a mess. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @magsbooth ID: 10500746 4. And on the rare occasion he tries to clean up, well‚Ä¶ View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @SEASurgzEvents Dishwashing soap does NOT go in the dishwasher, kid.
ID: 10500752 5. He‚Äôll do stupid shit that will require you to take him to get a tetanus shot. View this image ‚Ä∫
imgur.com ID: 10499973 6. And he‚Äôll injure himself in ways that will make you seriously question the theory of evolution. #backpackchallenge üòÇüòÇ
‚Äî Tyler;) (@Tyler_Davis2001) ID: 10499956 7. You‚Äôll fork over $100 for his yearbook only to see he pulled this shit. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @DJRodzilla ID: 10500237 8. You‚Äôll constantly be picking these up around the house. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @KinfoInfo ID: 10500602 9. Even grosser ‚Äî you‚Äôll find socks in his bedroom that miraculously stand at attention. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @sk8rboiii69 ID: 10500614 10. It won‚Äôt just be socks ‚Äî you‚Äôll find these more and more too. View this image ‚Ä∫
chapper5_ / Via instagram.com It seems your teenager catches a lot of colds when he‚Äôs alone in his room.
ID: 10501364 11. And honestly sometimes it‚Äôs not even subtle. View this image ‚Ä∫
squeaky623 10501367 12. This will drive you batty. View this image ‚Ä∫
alex1201412 10501154 13. When he gets together with his friends they will challenge each other to do some of the stupidest shit ever. View this image ‚Ä∫
imgur.com ID: 10501542 14. Speaking of stupid, his Facebook updates will make you wonder if he‚Äôs going to live with you forever. View this image ‚Ä∫
facebook.com ID: 10501469 15. If you get this order number, you will have to listen to him snicker endlessly. View this image ‚Ä∫
imgur.com ID: 10500861 16. Using the shower after him is guaranteed to make you shudder. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @JudithRalston ID: 10500008 17. Your biggest shudder, though, will come when you get in the shower and see what he left in there. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @MissLtodaA All he had to do was put it back in a drawer. Is that so much to ask to avoid family-wide shame?
ID: 10500904 18. He will probably wear a T-shirt like this in public. View this image ‚Ä∫
Twitter: @_Jennike_ YOUR PRIEST: ‚ÄúWhat does his shirt say?‚Äù
YOU: ‚ÄúWe, uh, erect them fast and keep them up.‚Äù
PRIEST: ‚ÄúHave him come to confession.‚Äù
ID: 10500736 19. If you ever look at his browser history, it will be burned into your memory for life. View this image ‚Ä∫
NBC ID: 10501496 20. And if your car gets dirty he might do this. View this image ‚Ä∫
smithsmith89 10501179 21. Finally, he‚Äôll do so much brooding that you‚Äôll find yourself acting like this just to get the knucklehead to spend time with you. View this image ‚Ä∫
NBC What else can you do? Despite it all you love the kid to pieces.
ID: 10501527
